text:
Bayram Şit (1930 – 29 May 2019) was a Turkish featherweight freestyle wrestler and coach. He competed at the 1952 and 1956 Summer Olympics. He won a gold medal in 1952 and placed fourth in 1956. He also won a silver medal at the 1954 World Championships. He was born in Akşar, Acıpayam.
Şit died on 29 May 2019, at the age of 89.
